original_text: Even when we were there with you, we told you that troubles would come. We told you before the troubles came and now it has really happened. You know that it is true.
korean_text: 우리가 너희와 함께 있을 때에 장차 받을 환난을 너희에게 미리 말하였는데 과연 그렇게 된 것을 너희가 아느니라

sentences.original_text: Even when we were there with you
we told you that troubles would come
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 너희에게 환난이 올 것이라 말하였고

sentences.original_text: We told you before the troubles came
and now it has really happened
You know that it is true
